localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

Looking for something competitive? You’ve come to the right place! Dogs of Combat is an online multiplayer FPS designed for PlayStation Mobile. Battle against other players from select countries in free-for-all deathmatches! You can also upgrade your character by buying stat-boosting items. But be aware, only 200 players can be on the game at a time.

Package size: 79 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player
Online multiplayer game support: Yes (2-200 Players)

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)/Japanese

Copyright © 2014-2015 Closed Umbrella Games. All rights reserved.

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

Battle against other players from select countries in free-for-all deathmatches! You can also upgrade your character by buying stat-boosting items. But be aware, only 200 players can be on the game at a time.

THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

Looking for something competitive? You’ve come to the right place! Dogs of Combat is an online multiplayer FPS designed for PlayStation Mobile. Battle against other players from select countries in free-for-all deathmatches! You can also upgrade your character by buying stat-boosting items. But be aware, only 200 players can be on the game at a time.

Package size: 79 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player
Online multiplayer game support: Yes (2-200 Players)

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)/Japanese

Copyright © 2014-2015 Closed Umbrella Games. All rights reserved.

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

CE CONTENU N'EST PAS COMPATIBLE AVEC LES PÉRIPHÉRIQUES Android™.

Vous cherchez quelque chose compétitifs? Vous êtes venu au bon endroit ! Les chiens de combat est un mode multijoueurs en ligne FPS conçu pour PlayStation Vita. Bataille contre d'autres joueurs de sélectionner les pays de libre-pour-tous les matchs! Vous pouvez également mettre à niveau votre personnage en achetant stat-renforçant les éléments. Mais être conscient, seulement 200 joueurs peuvent être sur le jeu à la fois.

Taille du programme : 79 Mo - Plus d’espace de stockage est requis pour l’installation

Information sur la compatibilité :
Nombre de joueurs pour le jeu local : 1 joueur
Mode multijoueur en ligne : Oui (2-200 joueurs)

Interfaces / capteurs compatibles
- Écran tactile
- Manette / Manette d’écran

Langues prises en charge :
Anglais(États-Unis)/Japonais

Copyright © 2014-2015 Closed Umbrella Games. All rights reserved.

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

QUESTO CONTENUTO NON È COMPATIBILE CON I DISPOSITIVI Android™.

State cercando un prodotto competitivo? Questo è il posto giusto! I cani di combattimento è un gioco multiplayer online FPS concepito per PlayStation
Mobile. Battaglia contro altri giocatori provenienti da alcuni paesi in free-per-tutti deathmatch! È inoltre possibile aggiornare il tuo personaggio acquistando stat-rilancio. Ma attenzione, solo 200 giocatori possono essere in gioco in un momento.

Dimensioni del pacchetto: 79 MB - Spazio di archiviazione aggiuntivo richiesto per l'installazione

Informazioni sulla compatibilità:
Numero di giocatori per la riproduzione in locale: 1 giocatore
Supporto giochi multiplayer online: Sì (2-200 giocatori)

Interfacce/sensori supportati
- Touchscreen
- Controller / Controller su schermo

Lingue supportate:
Inglese(Stati Uniti)/Giapponese

Copyright © 2014-2015 Closed Umbrella Games. All rights reserved.

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

このコンテンツはAndroid™端末非対応です。

何か競争力をお探しですか? 右の場所に来た! 戦闘の犬fpsのオンラインマルチプレイヤーを選択し国から他のプレイヤーには自由のdeathmatchesでの戦いがあるのです! また、文字stat-向上項目を買うことでアップグレードすることができます。 しかし、注意してください。200選手だけは、ゲームの時間にすることができます。

コンテンツ容量: 79 MB

プレイ人数: 1人
オンラインマルチプレイ: 2～200人

対応機能:
- タッチスクリーン
- コントローラーまたは、オンスクリーンコントローラー

対応言語:
英語(アメリカ)/日本語

著作権等:
Copyright © 2014-2015 Closed Umbrella Games. All rights reserved.

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
